events.message: I received my order last week but the product does not match the description. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the item not matching the description provided at purchase.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product was opened or used, so we can proceed with the refund process?
My order number is 45789123, and the product has not been opened or used since I decided it was not what I needed right after delivery.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please return the unopened item to our warehouse and we will credit your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to getting this resolved quickly.
Your refund case has been marked as resolved. Please ensure the product is shipped back to us to complete the refund process.
We wanted to follow up to confirm that you have returned the product and check if you have received the refund as expected.
Yes, I sent the product back yesterday, and I have just received the refund in my bank account. Thank you for your help!
Glad to hear everything went smoothly. We are closing your refund case now. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a quick satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is important to us.
